static __callStatic ( $  method,
$  options 
) [static]

Calls a static method in classPath if not found here. Allows you to extend this object at runtime with additional helpers.

Only available in PHP 5.3+

Parameters:
string $method
array $options
Returns:
mixed

Definition at line 1395 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        foreach ( self::$_classPath as $_class )
        {
            if ( method_exists( $_class, $method ) )
                return call_user_func_array( $_class . '::' . $method, $options );
        }
    }

static _end ( $  status = 0,
$  exit = true 
) [static]

Terminates the application. This method replaces PHP's exit() function by calling onEndRequest before exiting.

Parameters:
integer $status exit status (value 0 means normal exit while other values mean abnormal exit).
boolean $exit whether to exit the current request. This parameter has been available since version 1.1.5. It defaults to true, meaning the PHP's exit() function will be called at the end of this method. public

static _ge (  )  [static]

Returns the details about the error that is currently being handled. The error is returned in terms of an array, with the following information:

  • code - the HTTP status code (e.g. 403, 500)
  • type - the error type (e.g. 'CHttpException', 'PHP Error')
  • message - the error message
  • file - the name of the PHP script file where the error occurs
  • line - the line number of the code where the error occurs
  • trace - the call stack of the error
  • source - the context source code where the error occurs
Returns:
array the error details. Null if there is no error.

Definition at line 1236 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        return self::_a()->getErrorHandler()->getError();
    }

static _gpoa ( $  alias,
$  url = null 
) [static]

Translates an alias into a file path. Note, this method does not ensure the existence of the resulting file path. It only checks if the root alias is valid or not.

Parameters:
string $alias alias (e.g. system.web.CController)
string $url Additional url combine with alias
Returns:
mixed file path corresponding to the alias, false if the alias is invalid.

Definition at line 1324 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        $_path = Yii::getPathOfAlias( $alias );

        if ( false !== $_path && null !== $url )
            $_path = str_replace( $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'], '', $_path ) . $url;

        return $_path;
    }

static _publish ( $  path,
$  hashByName = false,
$  level = -1 
) [static]

Convenience access to CAssetManager::publish()

Publishes a file or a directory. This method will copy the specified asset to a web accessible directory and return the URL for accessing the published asset.

  • If the asset is a file, its file modification time will be checked to avoid unnecessary file copying;
  • If the asset is a directory, all files and subdirectories under it will be published recursively. Note, in this case the method only checks the existence of the target directory to avoid repetitive copying.
Parameters:
string the asset (file or directory) to be published
boolean whether the published directory should be named as the hashed basename. If false, the name will be the hashed dirname of the path being published. Defaults to false. Set true if the path being published is shared among different extensions.
integer level of recursive copying when the asset is a directory. Level -1 means publishing all subdirectories and files; Level 0 means publishing only the files DIRECTLY under the directory; level N means copying those directories that are within N levels.
Returns:
string an absolute URL to the published asset
Exceptions:
CException if the asset to be published does not exist.
See also:
CAssetManager::publish

Definition at line 1105 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        return self::$_thisApp->getAssetManager()->publish( $path, $hashByName, $level );
    }

static _rcf ( $  urlList,
$  media = '',
$  fromPublished = false 
) [static]

Registers a CSS file

Definition at line 853 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        if ( ! is_array( $urlList ) ) $urlList = array( $urlList );
        $_prefix = ( $fromPublished ? PS::getExternalLibraryUrl() . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR : null );

        foreach ( $urlList as $_url )
        {
            if ( $_url[0] != '/' && $fromPublished ) $_url = $_prefix . $_url;

            if ( ! self::$_clientScript->isCssFileRegistered( $_url ) )
                self::$_clientScript->registerCssFile( $_url, $media );
        }

static _rs ( $  sId = null,
$  sScript,
$  ePosition = CClientScript::POS_READY 
) [static]

Registers a piece of javascript code.

Parameters:
string ID that uniquely identifies this piece of JavaScript code
string the javascript code
integer the position of the JavaScript code. Valid values include the following:

  • CClientScript::POS_HEAD : the script is inserted in the head section right before the title element.
  • CClientScript::POS_BEGIN : the script is inserted at the beginning of the body section.
  • CClientScript::POS_END : the script is inserted at the end of the body section.
  • CClientScript::POS_LOAD : the script is inserted in the window.onload() function.
  • CClientScript::POS_READY : the script is inserted in the jQuery's ready function.

public

Definition at line 955 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        if ( ! self::$_clientScript->isScriptRegistered( $sId ) )
            self::$_clientScript->registerScript( PS::nvl( $sId, CPSWidgetHelper::getWidgetId() ), $sScript, $ePosition );
    }

Here is the caller graph for this function:

static _rsf ( $  urlList,
$  pagePosition = CClientScript::POS_HEAD,
$  fromPublished = false 
) [static]

Registers a javascript file.

Parameters:
array|string $urlList Urls of scripts to load. If URL starts with '!', asset library will be prepended. If first character is not a '/', the asset library directory is prepended.
integer $pagePosition the position of the JavaScript code. Valid values include the following:

  • CClientScript::POS_HEAD : the script is inserted in the head section right before the title element.
  • CClientScript::POS_BEGIN : the script is inserted at the beginning of the body section.
  • CClientScript::POS_END : the script is inserted at the end of the body section.
boolean $fromPublished If true, asset library directory is prepended to url public

Definition at line 816 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        if ( ! is_array( $urlList ) ) $urlList = array( $urlList );
        $_prefix = ( $fromPublished ? PS::getExternalLibraryUrl() . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR : null );

        //  Need external library?
        foreach ( $urlList as $_url )
        {
            if ( $_url[0] != '/' && $fromPublished ) $_url = $_prefix . $_url;

            if ( ! self::$_clientScript->isScriptFileRegistered( $_url ) )
                self::$_clientScript->registerScriptFile( $_url, $pagePosition );
        }
    }

static _serialize ( $  value  )  [static, protected]

Serializer that can handle SimpleXmlElement objects

Parameters:
mixed $value
Returns:
mixed

Definition at line 1409 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        try
        {
            if ( $value instanceof SimpleXMLElement || $value instanceof Util_SpXmlElement )
                return $value->asXML();

            if ( is_object( $value ) )
                return serialize( $value );
        }
        catch ( Exception $_ex )
        {
        }

        return $value;
    }

static _sqlAllScalar ( $  sql,
$  parameterList = null,
$  dbToUse = null 
) [static]

Executes the given sql statement and returns the first column of all results in an array

Parameters:
string $sql
array $parameterList List of parameters for call
CDbConnection $dbToUse
Returns:
array

Definition at line 1277 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        $_resultList = null;

        if ( null !== ( $_db = PS::nvl( $dbToUse, self::$_thisApp->getDb() ) ) )
        {
            if ( null !== ( $_rowList = $_db->createCommand( $sql )->queryAll( true, $parameterList ) ) )
            {
                $_resultList = array();

                foreach ( $_rowList as $_row )
                    $_resultList[] = $_row[0];
            }
        }

        return $_resultList;
    }

Here is the call graph for this function:

static _ss ( $  stateName,
$  stateValue,
$  defaultValue = null 
) [static]

Stores a variable from the user session

This function is designed to be used by CWebUser descendant classes who want to store additional user information in user session. By storing a variable using this function, the variable may be retrieved back later using _gs. The variable will be persistent across page requests during a user session.

Parameters:
string variable name

Multidimensional array search.

Definition at line 636 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        if ( is_array( $arHaystack ) )
        {
            $_iCount = count( $arHaystack );
            $_i = 0;

            foreach ( $arHaystack as $_key => $_oStraw )
            {
                $_bNext = ( ++$_i == $_iCount ) ? false : true;
                if ( is_array( $_oStraw ) ) $arPath[ $_key ] = $_key;
                self::array_search( $_oStraw, $arNeedle, $arResult, $arPath, $_key );
                if (!$_bNext) unset( $arPath[ $currentKey ] );
            }
        }
        else
        {

            if ( $_oStraw == $arNeedle )

                else
                    $_sPath = "\$arResult['".join("']['",$arPath)."'][$sCurrentKey] = \$arNeedle;";

                eval( $_sPath );
            }
        }
    }

static arrayToXml ( $  arData,
$  sRootNodeName = 'data',
$  sXml = null 
) [static]

Converts an array to Xml

Parameters:
mixed $arData The array to convert
mixed $sRootNodeName The name of the root node in the returned Xml
string $sXml The converted Xml

Definition at line 520 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        // turn off compatibility mode as simple xml doesn't like it
        if ( 1 == ini_get( 'zend.ze1_compatibility_mode' ) )
            ini_set( 'zend.ze1_compatibility_mode', 0 );

        if ( null == $sXml )
            $sXml = simplexml_load_string( "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?><{$sRootNodeName} />" );

        // loop through the data passed in.
        foreach ( $arData as $_key => $_newValue )
        {
            // no numeric keys in our xml please!
            if ( is_numeric($_key ) )
                $_key = "unknownNode_". ( string )$_key;

            // replace anything not alpha numeric
            $_key = preg_replace( '/[^a-z]/i', '', $_key );

            // if there is another array found recrusively call this function
            if ( is_array( $_newValue ) )
            {
                $_oNode = $sXml->addChild( $_key );
                self::arrayToXml( $_newValue, $sRootNodeName, $_oNode );
            }
            else
            {
                // add single node.
                $_newValue = htmlentities( $_newValue );
                $sXml->addChild( $_key, $_newValue );
            }
        }

        return( $sXml->asXML() );
    }

Definition at line 1362 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        $_value = false;

        if ( false !== ( $_value = filter_var( $value, FILTER_SANITIZE_NUMBER_INT ) ) )
        {
            if ( null !== $min && $_value < $min )
                return false;

            if ( null !== $max && $_value > $max )

        }

static in (  )  [static]

Convenience "in_array" method. Takes variable args.

The first argument is the needle, the rest are considered in the haystack. For example:

CPSHelperBase::in( 'x', 'x', 'y', 'z' ) returns true CPSHelperBase::in( 'a', 'x', 'y', 'z' ) returns false

Parameters:
mixed 
Returns:
boolean

Definition at line 189 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        $_haystack = func_get_args();

        if ( count( $_haystack ) > 1 )
        {
            $_needle = array_shift( $_haystack );
            return in_array( $_needle, $_haystack );
        }

        return false;
    }

        {

static makeHttpRequest ( $  url,
$  sQueryString = null,
$  method = 'GET',
$  sNewAgent = null,
$  iTimeOut = 60 
) [static]

Make an HTTP request

Parameters:
string $url The URL to call
string $sQueryString The query string to attach
string $method The HTTP method to use. Can be 'GET' or 'SET'
mixed $sNewAgent The custom user method to use. Defaults to 'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.0; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506; InfoPath.3)'
integer $iTimeOut The number of seconds to wait for a response. Defaults to 60 seconds
Returns:
mixed The data returned from the HTTP request or null for no data

Definition at line 379 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        //  Our user-agent string
        $_sAgent = PS::nvl( $sNewAgent, 'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.0; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506; InfoPath.3)' );

        //  Our return results
        $_sResult = null;
        $_payload = $sQueryString;

        //  Convert array to KVPs...
        if ( is_array( $sQueryString ) )
        {
            $_payload = null;

            foreach ( $sQueryString as $_key => $_value )
                $_payload .= "&{$_key}={$_value}";
        }

        // Use CURL if installed...
        if ( function_exists( 'curl_init' ) )
        {
            $_oCurl = curl_init();
            curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true );
            curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, true );
            curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, $_sAgent );
            curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, 60 );
            curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true );
            curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_URL, $url . ( 'GET' == $method ? ( ! empty( $_payload ) ? "?" . trim( $_payload, '&' ) : '' ) : '' ) );

            //  If this is a post, we have to put the post data in another field...
            if ( 'POST' == $method )
            {
                curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_URL, $url );
                curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_POST, true );
                curl_setopt( $_oCurl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $_payload );
            }

            $_sResult = curl_exec( $_oCurl );
            curl_close( $_oCurl );
        }
        else
            throw new Exception( '"libcurl" is required to use this functionality. Please reconfigure your php.ini to include "libcurl".' );

        return $_sResult;
    }

static nvl (  )  [static]

If value is not set or empty, last passed in argument is returned Allows for multiple nvl chains ( nvl(x,y,z,null) ) Since PHP evaluates the arguments before calling a function, this is NOT a short-circuit method.

Parameters:
mixed 
Returns:
mixed

Definition at line 160 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        $_default = null;
        $_args = func_num_args();
        $_haystack = func_get_args();

        for ( $_i = 0; $_i < $_args; $_i++ )
        {
            if ( isset( $_haystack[ $_i ] ) && ! empty( $_haystack[ $_i ] ) )
                return $_haystack[ $_i ];

            $_default = $_haystack[ $_i ];
        }

        return $_default;
    }

static o ( &$  optionList = array(),
$  key,

Definition at line 241 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        $_newValue = $defaultValue;

        if ( is_array( $optionList ) )
        {
            if ( ! array_key_exists( $key, $optionList ) )
            {
                //  Ignore case and look...
                $_newKey = strtolower( $key );

                foreach ( $optionList as $_key => $_value )
                {
                    if ( strtolower( $_key ) == $_newKey )
                    {
                        //  Set correct key and break
                        $key = $_key;
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }

            if ( isset( $optionList[$key] ) )
            {
                $_newValue = $optionList[$key];
                if ( $unsetValue ) unset( $optionList[$key] );
            }

            //  Set it in the array if not an unsetter...
            if ( ! $unsetValue ) $optionList[$key] = $_newValue;
        }

        //  Return...
        return $_newValue;
    }

static registerScript ( $  sId = null,
$  sScript,
$  ePosition = CClientScript::POS_READY 
) [static]

Registers a piece of javascript code.

Parameters:
string ID that uniquely identifies this piece of JavaScript code
string the javascript code
integer the position of the JavaScript code. Valid values include the following:

  • CClientScript::POS_HEAD : the script is inserted in the head section right before the title element.
  • CClientScript::POS_BEGIN : the script is inserted at the beginning of the body section.
  • CClientScript::POS_END : the script is inserted at the end of the body section.
  • CClientScript::POS_LOAD : the script is inserted in the window.onload() function.
  • CClientScript::POS_READY : the script is inserted in the jQuery's ready function.

Definition at line 435 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        $_sResult = "";
        $_l = strlen( $sTag );

        //  If near value given, get position of that as start
        if ( $sNear != null )
        {
            $_iStart = stripos( $sData, $sNear, $iStart );
            if ( $_iStart >= 0 )
                $iStart = $_iStart + strlen( $sNear );
        }

        $_i = stripos( $sData, $sTag, $iStart );
        $_k = strlen( $sTagEnd );

        if ( $_i !== false )
        {
            $_j = stripos( $sData, $sTagEnd, $_i + $_l );

            if ( $_j >= 0 )
            {
                $iStart = $_i;
                $_sResult = substr( $sData, $_i + $_l,  $_j - $_i - $_l );
            }

            return( trim( $_sResult ) );
        }

        return( null );
    }

) [static]

Generates a span or div wrapped hyperlink tag.

Parameters:
string $sText The link body. It will NOT be HTML-encoded. Therefore you can pass in HTML code such as an image tag.
string $url The Url of the link
string $sWrapperId The "id" of the created wrapper
array $arHtmlOptions Additional HTML attributes. Besides normal HTML attributes, a few special attributes are also recognized (see clientChange for more details.)
string $sClass The optional class of the created span
boolean $bUseDiv If true, a

tag will be used instead of a
Returns:
string The generated hyperlink

Definition at line 489 of file CPSHelperBase.php.

    {
        return( '<' .
            ( $bUseDiv ? 'div' : 'span' ) .
            ( null != $sWrapperId ? ' id="' . $sWrapperId . '"' : '' ) .
            ( null != $sClass ? ' class="' . $sClass . '"' : '' ) . '>' .
            CHtml::link( $sText, $url, $arHtmlOptions ) .
            '</' . ( $bUseDiv ? 'div' : 'span' ) . '>'
        );
    }
